name: Battle High 2
summary: Battle High 2 is the sequel to the indie fighting game Battle High: Elemental Revolt. A mysterious force has been causing illness within select students and stripping them of their powers. Each of the students has his or her own agenda during these times of turmoil. Some are investigating the power disruption. Some seek the source so that they can be normal again. Others have completely other scores to settle and others just want to watch the world burn.
